title: Sweetheart Annie makes ten Annie skins.  Seriously?
body: With so many champions in need of skin love, why push out a tenth Annie skin?  Concept is cute and all, but wouldn't it be better to have the Valentine's skin on a champion like Talon?

There are a lot of competing interests at work here, but the one that's usually overlooked is the business side of things.  Annie is a popular champion, especially among the female audience, and her skins likely generate high sales.  Having a concentration of skins on certain champions is an easy way for Riot to make money without exerting that much effort or disrupting the rest of the game world.

It's a win/win/lose, I guess.  Annie fans are happy, Riot makes money, but some players get frustrated at the lost opportunity cost.  At the end of the day, that's an easy business decision to make.
